Sep   Pittsburgh Pennsylvania USA Cleveland Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson  prepares for a game against the Pittsburgh Steelers at Acrisure Stadium PERIOD Mandatory Credit Philip G PERIOD PavelyUSA TODAY Sports

Cleveland Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson returned to practice on Thursday PERIOD

He has not played since bruising the rotator cuff in his right throwing shoulder in Week  PERIOD He hasnt had a full practice since Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

Offensive coordinator Alex Van Pelt and wide receiver Amari Cooper confirmed Watsons participation on Thursday after he was held out of Wednesdays first practice of the week PERIOD

Watsons status for Sundays game at Indianapolis remains uncertain PERIOD

Coming off a win against the previously unbeaten San Francisco 49ers PJ Walker would again start under center for the Browns  against the Colts  if Watson is not ready to return PERIOD

Watson has said he first sustained the injury in Week  against Tennessee on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD Watson insisted that he would play in Week  against Baltimore before a  according to the team sidelined him for that game PERIOD

The Browns had a bye in Week  PERIOD

Watson  has thrown for  yards and four touchdowns against two interceptions in three games this season while getting sacked  times PERIOD
